participant_1.background:
I spend my weekends training for triathlons and dreaming about travelling.
i watch every football game at alabama.
I finally got a new graphics card for my computer so I can play Quake at a higher resolution!
I take my pets to my lake in the backyard every day and watch them swim as I drink tea.
I enjoy visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.

participant_2.background:
I imagine myself fighting in the arena as mileena.
i have a cat named jasper.
i work at a doctor s office.
I'm not always graceful, but my kids find it hilarious when I trip over my own feet.
i like things that explode.

content.text: Hey, how is your morning going?
It's going great! I'm at work, but I am looking forward to getting home to my cat, Jasper.
I have a cat too! Her name is Luna and she is the sweetest cat.
I love cats! They are so cuddly and cute.
Yeah, I love cuddling with Luna. She's also great at catching mice.
That's awesome! I've always wanted a cat that could catch mice.
Jasper isn't as good at catching mice, but he's great at playing fetch.
That's really cute! I'm sure Jasper is a great pet.
He is! He's always there to greet me when I get home from work.
That's so sweet! I'm glad you have such a great pet.
Thanks! I'm glad you have a great pet too.
Thanks! I'm sure Jasper and Luna would get along great if they ever met.
I think they would too! They're both such sweet cats.
It's too bad we can't arrange a playdate for them.
Yeah, that would be so much fun! Maybe we can do that sometime in the future.
That would be great! I'm sure they would love to meet each other.
